final_answer:
The image is funny and satirical because it juxtaposes the idea of an "empty basket" with someone bent over under a massive pile of household items on their head. 

The text "YES" and "BUT" adds to the humor by suggesting that while the basket is conveniently empty (YES), the person is ironically overloaded and struggling (BUT). This highlights the absurdity of having a tool that's meant to carry items being unused, while the person bears the burden in an impractical and humorous way. The contrast and exaggeration create a visual joke about inefficiency or misplaced effort.
